name: Coffin Maker
description: A craftsman who builds burial containers; adventurers might find evidence of suspicious deaths, commission special containers, or discover hidden compartments.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of wood and the somber atmosphere of mortality. The sound of saws cutting wood and hammers striking creates a methodical, respectful rhythm. Half-finished coffins line the space, while the air carries the weight of finality and the dignity of proper burial.
